question.text: The amount of urine released by humans in a day is

options.text: 1 to 1.5 litres of slightly acidic (pH-6.0) urine having 45-60 gm of urea.
1 to 1.5 litres of slightly acidic (pH-6.0) urine having 25-30 gm of urea.
0 to 1 litres of slightly alkaline (pH-7.3) urine having 25-30 gm of urea.
1 to 1.5 litres of slightly acidic (pH-6.0) urine having 45-60 gm of urea.

solution.text:
Urine

Daily excretion : 1 to 1.5 litres of urine per day.

Colour : Light yellow coloured watery fluid.

pH = 6.0 (slightly acidic).

It is having a characteristic odour.

Approximately 25-30 gm of urea is excreted per day.

Analysis of urine helps in clinical diagnosis of disorders of the kidney.
